TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Afih, title = Afih, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afih} }

S.FORM: Afih Itiniay i Yuli Cen no Hualien ko Afih a niyaro', 94 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 293 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 77% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 226 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 23% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 70%, Bunun 2%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.

Afih Itiniay i Yoli Cen no Hoalien ko Afih a niyaro', 94 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 293 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 77% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 226 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 23% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 67 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 70%, Bonon 2%, Tayal 1%, roma 3%.
